Verses: 1 pirindhupogiravan Than Ichchaiyinpadi Seyyappaarkkiraan, Ellaa Gnaanaththilum Thalaiyittukkollugiraan.
2 moodan Gnaanaththil Piriyankollaamal, Than Manadhilullavaigalai Velippaduththap Piriyappadugiraan.
3 dhunmaarkkan Vara Avamaanam Varum; Avamaanaththode Nindhaiyum Varum.
4 manushanudaiya Vaaimozhigal Aazhamaana Jalampolirukkum; Gnaanaththin Ootru Paaigira Aatraippolirukkum.
5 vazhakkile Needhimaanaith Thorkadikkiradharku, Dhunmaarkkanukku Mugadhaatchiniyampannuvadhu Nalladhalla;
6 moodanudaiya Udhadugal Vivaadhaththil Nuzhaiyum, Avan Vaai Adigalai Varavazhaikkum.
7 moodanudaiya Vaai Avanukkuk Kedu, Avan Udhadugal Avan Aaththumaavukkuk Kanni.
8 kolkaaranudaiya Vaarththaigal Vilaiyaattupolirukkum, Aanaalum Avaigal Ullaththirkul Thaikkum.
9 than Velaiyil Asadhiyaayiruppavan Azhimbanukku Sagodharan.
10 karththarin Naamam Balaththa Thurugam; Needhimaan Adharkul Odi Sugamaayiruppaan.
11 aisuvariyavaanudaiya Porul Avanukku Aranaana Pattanam; Adhu Avan Ennaththil Uyarndha Madhilpolirukkum.
12 azhivu Varumun Manushanudaiya Irudhayam Irumaappaayirukkum; Menmaikku Munnaanadhu Thaazhmai.
13 kaariyaththaik Ketkumun Uththaram Sollugiravanukku, Adhu Buththiyeenamum Vetkamumaayirukkum.
14 manushanudaiya Aavi Avan Balaveenaththaith Thaangum; Murindha Aavi Yaaraal Thaangakkoodum?
15 buththimaanudaiya Manam Arivai Sambaadhikkum; Gnaaniyin Sevi Arivai Naadum.
16 oruvan Kodukkum Vegumadhi Avanukku Vazhiyundaakki, Periyorgalukku Munbaaga Avanaik Kondupoividum.
17 than Vazhakkile Mudhalpesugiravan Needhimaanpol Kaanappaduvaan; Avan Ayalaano Vandhu Avanaip Parisodhikkiraan.
18 seettuppodudhal Virodhangalai Ozhiththu, Balavaangal Naduve Sikkarukkum.
19 aranaana Pattanaththai Vasappaduththuvadhaippaarkkilum Kobankonda Sagodharanai Vasappaduththuvadhu Aridhu; Avargaludaiya Virodhangal Kottaith Thaazhppaalgal Polirukkum.
20 avanavan Vaayin Balanaal Avanavan Vayiru Nirambum; Avanavan Udhadugalin Vilaivinaal Avanavan Thrupthiyaavaan.
21 maranamum Jeevanum Naavin Adhigaaraththilirukkum; Adhil Piriyappadugiravargal Adhin Kaniyaip Pusippaargal.
22 manaiviyaik Kandadaigiravan Nanmaiyaanadhaik Kandadaigiraan; Karththaraal Dhayaiyum Petrukkollugiraan.
23 thariththiran Kenjikketkiraan; Aisuvariyavaan Kadinamaai Uththaravukodukkiraan.
24 snegidharullavan Snegam Paaraattavendum; Sagodharanilum Adhiga Sondhamaai Snegippavanumundu.
